issue.title: [R] Implement as.integer and as.numeric for timestamp types etc. in Arrow dplyr queries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17428](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17428). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In R, the POSIXct type are converted to seconds, so division and rounding are required within arrow, depending on the unit.
